description: Open-access archive for scholarly articles in physics, mathematics, computer science, and more.

description: Search engine for scholarly literature across disciplines and sources.

description: Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share research.

title: Overleaf
description: Online LaTeX editor for collaborative writing and publishing.

title: MIT OpenCourseWare
description: Free web-based publication of virtually all MIT course content.

title: Khan Academy
description: Free educational resources for all ages across multiple subjects.

title: Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy
description: Comprehensive reference work on philosophy maintained by experts.

title: Project Gutenberg
description: Library of over 60,000 free eBooks with expired U.S. copyright.

title: Kaggle
description: Platform for data science competitions, datasets, and community.

title: Google Dataset Search
description: Search engine for datasets across the web.

title: Sci-Hub
description: Website providing free access to research papers and books.

title: Library Genesis
description: File-sharing website for scholarly journal articles, academic texts, and general-interest books.

title: Connected Papers
description: Visual tool to help researchers and students find and explore papers relevant to their field of work.

title: Coursera
description: Online learning platform offering courses from top universities and companies.

title: Internet Archive
description: Non-profit library of millions of free books, movies, software, music, and more.

title: ResearchGate
description: Social networking site for scientists and researchers to share papers and connect.

title: Mendeley
description: Reference manager and academic social network that helps organize research.
